name: 0a05ffad-6881-51c5-8c9f-f53b260abf26
notes: Dataset provides soluble reactive phosphorus (SRP) concentrations measured in Lake Scuro Parmense in 2012. Water samples were collected by means of a Ruttner bottle at different depths over the whole water column at the point of maximum depth of the lake. Samples were analysed spectrophotometrically according to Valderrama (1981).
title: IT_SI001230_Lake Scuro_SRP_20130228
